data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 / Windows 10 Pro x64
data.actual_result: You can only escape the popup by clicking cancel on the popup or esc key
data.expected_result: You should be able to close the pop up by clicking anywhere on the screen that isn't said popup
data.short_description: When uploading a file, you can't escape the popup by clicking out of it
data.steps_to_repro: - Grab your favourite picture and chat and attempt to upload said picture to the channel - when the "enter a comment" popup appears, try to click out of the popup area in an attempt to close it - after observing, click escape to be able to close the pop up
